title: sexylun
author: sexylun
content: Who will Win Big Boss Season 16 .Anyone Gambling on the contestants today ?

comments.author: RapTarX
comments.body: Game Badlega, Kyunki Bigg Boss Khud Khelega!Â  Is there any platform where people can place bets on the Big Boss season winners? I have never seen such an option in any of the bookies though I haven't tried any local bookie. Maybe I have missed the famous bookie. I guess such an option shouldn't be there as the result can be manipulated.I don't watch Big Boss season either; can't remember when I watched last time LOL.

comments.author: og kush420
comments.body: Quote from: klidex on February 12, 2023, 05:13:34 PMQuote from: sexylun on February 12, 2023, 11:59:42 AMWho will Win Big Boss Season 16 .Anyone Gambling on the contestants today ?I don't know who will win in Big Boss Season 16 because I myself don't follow such games and am not at all interested.It would be better for me and us to follow some of the most popular games that are really reliable so they can provide more benefits than following and watching Big Boss Season 16.There may indeed be some people who are interested and interested but I'm sure there won't be many people there.Big Boss and other indian channels are banned in our country I get some ideas from the news - but on the other hand I think it is waste of time - I only like Shahnaz from old contestant

comments.author: Alisha-k
comments.body: I have a problem with following up on reality TV shows, the thought of staying clued to my screen just to see how persons live their life and get paid at the end of the season is what I can't do at all......Like, can y'all also watch me??They're so many better challenging, educating and impactful competitions the government can venture into and we the citizens would proudly promote.

comments.author: Daltonik
comments.body: Quote from: sexylun on February 12, 2023, 11:59:42 AMWho will Win Big Boss Season 16 .Anyone Gambling on the contestants today ?Well, apparently, the winner of the 16th season of Bigg Boss has already become known and he was picked up by MC Stan, who beat Shiv Thakare and takes the award for the victory in the amount of 31,80,000 rupees and the Hyundai Grand i10 Nios car.https://indianexpress.com/article/entertainment/television/bigg-boss-season-16-winner-mc-stan-wins-bigg-boss-16-8440429/
